sentence.Network_en: He has lithiasis, and the violent pain makes him sweat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他患有结石病, 一病发就疼得汗珠直淌.

sentence.Network_en: Refer to the lithiasis, many people think that it's caused by eating unhealthy food.
sentence.Network_cn: 提及结石病, 很多人认为是因饮食不卫生而导致体内形成“石头”.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of intrahepatic lithiasis in caudate lobe.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨肝尾叶胆管结石的术中诊断与手术处理方法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 胆石病(cholelithiasis)是指发生于胆道系统任何部位和不同病理状况下的结石病(lithiasis)[1],是我国特别是农村居民的常见病、多发病。为了解目前南方农村居民.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin, based on Greek lithos 'stone'

means.word_mean: 1. the formation of stones (calculi) in an internal organ
